ada samaja jalawala wairaya wapurana (muslim janathawa gana pamanak nowa me wyasanayata wiruddhawa kathakarana aya ganada) pirisen ki deneku 1983 juli masayedi siduwu siddhin mathakaye randennata tharam wayasaka sitiyadayi nodanimi.
